com.defano.jmonet.model

Class FlexQuadrilateral

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.defano.jmonet.model.FlexQuadrilateral
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Quadrilateral

    public class FlexQuadrilateral
extends Object
implements Quadrilateral
    Models a mutable, four-sided, simple polygon (quadrilateral) with no restrictions on the length, angle or parallelism, except that the shape's edges cannot cross each other (self-intersecting quadrilaterals are disallowed).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FlexQuadrilateral(Point topLeft, Point topRight, Point bottomLeft, Point bottomRight)
      Constructs a mutable quadrilateral whose corners appear in the given locations.
      FlexQuadrilateral(Shape fromShape)
      Constructs a mutable quadrilateral whose corners are defined by the bounds (minimum bounding rectangle) of the given shape.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Gets the bottom-left corner of this quadrilateral.

      Sets the top-left corner of this shape.
      void setTopRight(Point topRight)
      Sets the top-right corner of this shape.
      FlexQuadrilateral translate(int dx, int dy)
      Produces a copy of this quadrilateral, translated by a given amount in the x and y directions.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FlexQuadrilateral

        public FlexQuadrilateral(Point topLeft,
                         Point topRight,
                         Point bottomLeft,
                         Point bottomRight)
        Constructs a mutable quadrilateral whose corners appear in the given locations. Note that this constructor does not validate the corner arguments. Caller is responsible for assuring corners do not produce a self-intersecting polygon.
        Parameters:
        topLeft - The top-left corner
        topRight - The top-right corner
        bottomLeft - The bottom-left corner
        bottomRight - The bottom-right corner

      • FlexQuadrilateral

        public FlexQuadrilateral(Shape fromShape)
        Constructs a mutable quadrilateral whose corners are defined by the bounds (minimum bounding rectangle) of the given shape.
        Parameters:
        fromShape - The shape whose bounds should determine the corners of the new quadrilateral.

    • Method Detail

      • getTopLeft

        public Point getTopLeft()
        Gets the top-left corner of this quadrilateral.
        Specified by:
        getTopLeft in interface Quadrilateral
        Returns:
        The requested corner point.

      • setTopLeft

        public void setTopLeft(Point topLeft)
        Sets the top-left corner of this shape.

        Has no affect if placing the corner in the requested location would produce a self-intersecting polygon.

        Parameters:
        topLeft - The requested location of the corner.

      • getTopRight

        public Point getTopRight()
        Gets the top-right corner of this quadrilateral.

      • translate

        public FlexQuadrilateral translate(int dx,
                                   int dy)
        Produces a copy of this quadrilateral, translated by a given amount in the x and y directions. Does not affect this shape in any way.
        Parameters:
        dx - The number of pixels in the x-direction to translate
        dy - The number of pixels in the y-direction to translate
        Returns:
        A new, translated quadrilateral.
